home.title: Free speed Video Downloader
home.subtitle: Download videos from YouTube, Instagram, TikTok and more

meta.title: Free Video Downloader — YouTube, TikTok, Instagram | HD & 4K Quality
meta.description: Download videos from YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK for free without registration. Shorts, Reels, Stories in HD and 4K quality. Fast, secure, no watermarks.

about.title: One Service — All Platforms
about.text1: Looking for a reliable way to save your favorite videos? Our free online video downloader supports popular video hosting sites and social networks: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK, Vimeo, and many more. No software installation required — everything works directly in your browser.
about.text2: Save videos in the highest available quality — from 360p to 4K Ultra HD. Music videos, Shorts, Reels, Stories, tutorials, or vlogs — our service handles it all. Download videos without watermarks in original quality.
about.text3: Simply paste the video URL, select your preferred format and quality, then download. Fast, free, and anonymous. No registration, no data collection, no hidden fees.

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.text: Our optimized servers process videos significantly faster than other similar services. Save your time with high-speed downloads.

safe.title: Safe & Private
safe.text: Your privacy matters. We don't collect personal data, require registration, or store your download history. Completely anonymous.

free.title: Completely Free
free.text: All features available without payment, subscriptions, or hidden limits. Unlimited downloads, forever free.

platforms.title: Growing Platform List
platforms.text: YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, VK, Vimeo — and this is just the beginning. We constantly add support for new platforms.

noInstall.title: No Installation
noInstall.text: Works directly in your browser on any device. No need to download apps or extensions — just open the site and start downloading.

quality.title: Best Quality
quality.text: Download videos in original quality up to 4K Ultra HD. Choose from multiple formats: MP4, MP3, WebM. No watermarks added.

form.supported: Supported platforms: YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, VK, Vimeo

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

500.title: Server Error
500.description: Something went wrong. Please try again later.

footer.description: Free online tool to download videos from popular platforms.
